message:
Please follow the rules of the group:

1. Be respectful to others.
2. No spamming or self-promotion.
3. Avoid sharing inappropriate content.


Penalties:
1. First offense: Warning.
2. Second offense: Temporary removal from the group.
3. Third offense: Permanent removal from the group.


Updates:
1. Group events and announcements will be shared regularly.
2. Any changes to the group rules will be communicated in advance.

Thank you for your cooperation!
